Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Berteau
ShortDescription: #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th Street/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temp rerouted via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stoney Island and 67th, due to police activity near 67th Street/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stoney Island, then resume their normal on 67th, due to police activity near 67th Street/Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Logan Square. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Logan Square.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Grand
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Grand due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Grand due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include these bus routes:

  • #29 State
  • #36 Broadway
  • #65 Grand

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
